0.5.name: wordpress/wpquotidian
0.5.description: WPQuotidian is a simple plugin that displays a random or daily quote in a widget. You can use the provided text file with inspirational quotes, edit it, or upload your own. Up to 366 daily quotes with attributions are allowed. If using the random option, you can have as many quotes and attributions as you like.
